com.cloudera.oryx.als.common.NoSuchItemException

  • Packages that use NoSuchItemException 
    Package Description
    com.cloudera.oryx.als.common  
    com.cloudera.oryx.als.serving  

    • Uses of NoSuchItemException in com.cloudera.oryx.als.common

      Methods in com.cloudera.oryx.als.common that throw NoSuchItemException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float OryxRecommender.estimateForAnonymous(String toItemID, String[] itemIDs)
      A version of OryxRecommender.estimatePreference(String, String) that, like OryxRecommender.recommendToAnonymous(String[], float[], int), operates on "anonymous" users -- defined not by a previously known set of data, but data given in the request.
      float OryxRecommender.estimateForAnonymous(String toItemID, String[] itemIDs, float[] values)
      A version of OryxRecommender.estimatePreference(String, String) that, like OryxRecommender.recommendToAnonymous(String[], float[], int), operates on "anonymous" users -- defined not by a previously known set of data, but data given in the request.
      List<IDValue> OryxRecommender.mostSimilarItems(String[] itemIDs, int howMany) 
      List<IDValue> OryxRecommender.mostSimilarItems(String[] itemIDs, int howMany, PairRescorer rescorer) 
      List<IDValue> OryxRecommender.mostSimilarItems(String itemID, int howMany)
      Returns items that are most similar to the given item, as its name implies.
      List<IDValue> OryxRecommender.mostSimilarItems(String itemID, int howMany, PairRescorer rescorer) 
      List<IDValue> OryxRecommender.recommendedBecause(String userID, String itemID, int howMany)
      Lists the items that were most influential in recommending a given item to a given user.
      List<IDValue> OryxRecommender.recommendToAnonymous(String[] itemIDs, float[] values, int howMany)
      Like OryxRecommender.recommendToAnonymous(String[], int) but allows specifying values associated with items.
      List<IDValue> OryxRecommender.recommendToAnonymous(String[] itemIDs, float[] values, int howMany, Rescorer rescorer)
      Like OryxRecommender.recommendToAnonymous(String[], int, Rescorer) but lets caller specify strength scores associated to each of the items.
      List<IDValue> OryxRecommender.recommendToAnonymous(String[] itemIDs, int howMany)
      Computes recommendations for a user that is not known to the model yet; instead, the user's associated items are supplied to the method and it proceeds as if a user with these associated items were in the model.
      List<IDValue> OryxRecommender.recommendToAnonymous(String[] itemIDs, int howMany, Rescorer rescorer)
      Like OryxRecommender.recommendToAnonymous(String[], int) but rescorer results like OryxRecommender.recommend(String, int, boolean, Rescorer).
      float[] OryxRecommender.similarityToItem(String toItemID, String... itemIDs)
